properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 11 at 2:04AM CST until January 11 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds around 20 knots becoming northwest winds 20
to 25 knots, with gusts to 35 knots Saturday morning. Bays
waters will be choppy to rough.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20
NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until noon CST today. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from noon today to 3 PM CST this
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gale force winds and high seas will result in
dangerous marine conditions which could result in capsized or
damaged vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
